name: Radiant Dawn (Herlehos)
description:
Radiant Dawn is a JRPG we made as our graduation project after 4 years of studies at Game Sup, Lyon, France.

Duration: 15 weeks

Radiant Team:

BILLON Gersende - BOTTACCIO Lucas - BASSET ROMAIN - COUZON Pierre - DELEARD Victor - EXCOFFON Thomas - FERRERE Clarence - GIROS Damien - GOURVIL Marie - NALLBANI Mélani - OUALID Nathan - PIOLA Lucy - ROTZINGER Inès - SANTOS Marina - SOLEILHAC Lauryn - TREMOSA Bastien - VAGNECK Mélanie
